snippet.title: 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Sentinel No. 13: Activated. 

The critically acclaimed sci-fi epic 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim is coming to Nintendo Switch on April 12, 2022!

#13Sentinels #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
